definitions.definition: An utterance or gesture expressing greeting or honor towards someone, ( now especially ) a formal, non-verbal gesture made with the arms or hands in any of various specific positions.
examples: The soldiers greeted the dignitaries with a crisp salute .

definitions.definition: A discharge of cannon or similar arms, as a mark of honour or respect.
A pyrotechnic device primarily designed to produce a loud bang .

main_definition: An utterance or gesture expressing greeting or honor towards someone, ( now especially ) a formal, non-verbal gesture made with the arms or hands in any of various specific positions. [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: A kiss , offered in salutation . [from 16th c.]
( military , nautical ) A discharge of cannon or similar arms, as a mark of honour or respect. [from 17th c.]
A pyrotechnic device primarily designed to produce a loud bang .
